info.author: Nick Ficano
info.description:
=======
JotOnce
=======

.. image:: https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/jotonce.svg
  :alt: Pypi
  :target: https://pypi.python.org/pypi/jotonce/

.. image:: https://img.shields.io/pypi/pyversions/jotonce.svg
  :alt: Python Versions
  :target: https://pypi.python.org/pypi/jotonce/

.. image:: https://travis-ci.org/nficano/jotonce.com.svg?branch=master
   :alt: Build status
   :target: https://travis-ci.org/nficano/jotonce.com

*JotOnce* is a simple web application written in Flask, providing password-protected, sharable notes.

Description
===========

*JotOnce* was originally a Python/Django app, written by myself and `Jon Drosdeck`_ in 2005.

As of December 2015 I began to rewrite *JotOnce* using Python/Flask and Redis as my primary data store.

.. _Jon Drosdeck: https://github.com/JDrosdeck/


Requirements
============

- Python 2.6+ (2.7 or 3.4 recommended)
- Redis 3.0.5


Installation
============

Download using pip via pypi.

.. code:: bash

    pip install jotonce
